SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Address
Class representing an address.
Book
The Book class represents a book product in UniShop.
Buyer
Class containing information about a buyer.
BuyerMenu
Class representing the buyer's menu page.
BuyerMetrics
Represents the buyer's metrics.
BuyerSignUp
Class representing the buyer's sign up screen.
Cart
Class that represents the cart of a buyer, which contains the products that the buyer wants to buy, as well as their quantities
CartController
Class that represents the controller of the shopping cart so that the buyerMenu is not overloaded.
Catalog
The Catalog class represents a catalog of products and sellers in UniShop.
CatalogController
The CatalogController class represents a controller responsible for managing the interaction between the buyer user interface and the catalog, allowing the user to browse, search, and interact with products and sellers.
Category
Enum class for the categories of the products
CreditCard
Class representing a credit card.
DataBase
Class that represents the database of the platform, which contains all the users, products, and orders.
Evaluation
Class that represents an evaluation of a product.
Hardware
The Hardware class represents a hardware product in UniShop.
HomeScreen
Class that represents the home screen of the platform, the first thing the user sees when he opens the program
InputManager
Gets a user's input in the command line.
InventoryController
Class that represents the inventory screen of the platform, where the seller can add, remove or change the quantity of products, as well as add promotions to them
IssueQuery
Class that represents an issue query, which is a request from a buyer to the seller to solve an issue with a product
LearningResource
The LearningResource class represents a learning resource product in UniShop.
LoginScreen
Class that represents the login screen of the platform, which allows the user to login
Menu
The Menu class is an abstract class that serves as the base for various user menus in UniShop.
Metrics
The Metrics interface provides utility methods for handling metrics-related operations.
Notification
Class representing a notification a user gets.
NotificationSender
Class that represents the notification sender, which allows the platform to send notifications to the users.
OfficeEquipment
The OfficeEquipment class represents an office equipment product in UniShop.
Order
Class that represents an order, which is a request from a buyer to the seller to buy a number of products
OrderController
Class with utilities related to a product.
OrderController
Class managing a seller's orders.
OrderState
Enum class for the states of the orders
Product
Represents the blueprint of any products sold on UniShop.
ProfileController
Class with utilities related to the buyer's profile.
ProfileController
Class managing a seller's profile.
Seller
Class containing information about a seller.
SellerMenu
The SellerMenu class represents the menu and user interface for a Seller in UniShop.
SellerMetrics
The SellerMetrics class represents the metrics of a seller in UniShop.
SellerSignUp
Class managing a seller's sign up.
SerializationUtil
The SerializationUtil class provides utility methods for serializing and deserializing objects, specifically instances of the DataBase class.
SignUpScreen
Interface to create sign up screens for a buyer and a seller.
Stationery
The Stationery class represents a stationery product in an online marketplace.
UIUtilities
Class that contains some methods utilities for the UIs to allow the user to interact with the platform
UniShop
Class representing the UniShop platform
User
Abstract class representing a user.
